content: this squirrel is made all in one piece no sewing together of body parts required **materials & tools** 17 yards red or gray worsted weight yarn 2 yards white worsted weight yarn 1 pair 6mm black safety eyes stuffing 3 5mm e crochet hook this pattern uses both tapestry crochet 1 and loop stitch 2 1 http //primarilypatterns blogspot com/2016/02/tapestry-crochet-tutorial html 2 http //primarilypatterns blogspot com/2016/02/crochet-loop-stitch-tutorial html
